2791212.description: Linda talks about how small steps towards building a more inclusive community can add up to significant change.

2791211.description: Dave, a local journalist and co-founder of Madison365, talks about the importance of who tells the story, and what gets used as a source for stories.

2791210.description: Abby talks about the role local journalists can play in centering the voices of the people most impacted.

2791209.description: Linda, a journalist from Minnesota, talks about what it would look like if journalists were trained to ask who benefits and who is harmed by their stories.

2791208.description: Abby, a journalist in Madison, WI, talks about different news models and the importance of time in producing inclusive local journalism.

2791207.description: Abby, a journalist with the Cap Times in Madison, WI, offers advice to journalism students.

2791206.description: Linda from Minnesota talks about the tension for journalism professors who want to cultivate storytelling particularly from underheard communities, but being concerned that when the journalist students join mainstream newsrooms they will be told they are biased.
